Quiche Lorraine

Prep Time

<30min

Cooking Time

25 min

Serves

4

Family Rating

5 stars

Source

“Tartes, quiches, pizzas” (ISBN 978-2-84831-121-0)

Tip

stir-fry peas, carrots and/or mushrooms together with the bacon bits

For the pastry: Pate Brisée

Ingredients

  • 1 roll of dough

  • 4 eggs

  • 100 ml milk

  • 200 ml creme

  • 200 g bacon bits (1 package)

  • pepper

  • nutmeg

Preparation

  1. heat up oven to 180 degrees

  2. roll out dough, punch bottom with a fork and pre-cook for 10 min

  3. fry the bacon strips without any oil in non-stick pan and put aside

  4. mix eggs, milk and cream, add nutmeg and pepper

  5. place bacon on bottom of mould, cover with egg/cream mixture

  6. 25min in oven, until there’s no liquid in the middle
